name: RR Report
query:
select 
    p.name 'ID', 
    p.company 'Company', 
    d.pattern_code 'Pattern Code', 
    d.pattern_name 'Pattern Name', 
    cd.item_code 'Casting Item Code',
    cd.item_name 'Casting Item Name', 
    cd.rr_weight_total 'RR Weight For Total Quantity:Float:90', 
    cd.rr_weight 'RR Weight Per Unit:Float:90'
   
FROM 
    `tabPouring` p 
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPattern Details` d on p.name = d.parent
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabCasting Details` cd ON p.name = cd.parent
WHERE
    p.docstatus ='1'
    AND p.heat_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND p.company = %(company)s
GROUP BY
    cd.item_code
